Pre-Game Insights: South Africa come into this T20 series after losing the ODI series to Pakistan a few days ago.
The visitors picked up an outstanding series win in the ODIs and now come into the T20s full of confidence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Johannesburg is expected to have clear and sunny weather during the match.
The pitch at the Wanderers is expected to be a batting beauty.
Others: The team batting first has won the last four T20I games played at this venue. So expect the captain winning the toss to bat first and put up a big total on the board.
A score of around 190 runs should be a competitive one.
